author: bsunanda
body: Add two filters (1) for selection on multiple types of L1 objects; (2) Laser fire in HCAL. Back port the two PR's #19574 and #20049
title: Run2-hcx140 Backport PR's #19574 and #20049 which provides two HLT filters (1) for selecting multiple L1 objects; (2) Laser firing in HCAL
